SearchListSpec.Name: Partner Organization Search
SearchListSpec.Description: Find organizations that have the partner constituency
SearchListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPSearchList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SEARCHLIST_PARTNERFORMERCYORG ( @NAME nvarchar(100) = null, @LOOKUPID nvarchar(10) = null, @CITY nvarchar(100) = null, @STATEID uniqueidentifier = null, @MAXROWS smallint = 500 ) as --set @NAME = '%' + coalesce(@NAME,'') + '%' ; set @NAME = replace(@NAME,'*','%'); --set @LOOKUPID = coalesce(@LOOKUPID,'') + '%' ; set @LOOKUPID = replace(@LOOKUPID,'*','%'); --set @CITY = '%' + coalesce(@CITY,'') + '%' ; set @CITY = replace(@CITY,'*','%');
declare @partnerConstituentCodeID uniqueidentifier = null declare @partnerChurchConstituentCodeID uniqueidentifier = null declare @partnerGroupConstituentCodeID uniqueidentifier = null
begin try select @partnerConstituentCodeID = ID from dbo.CONSTITUENCYCODE where DESCRIPTION = lower ('Partnership for Mercy - Partner') if @partnerConstituentCodeID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Could not find "Partnership for Mercy - Partner" constituency code'
select @partnerChurchConstituentCodeID = ID from dbo.CONSTITUENCYCODE where DESCRIPTION = lower ('Partner - Church') if @partnerChurchConstituentCodeID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Could not find "Partner - Church" constituency code'
select @partnerGroupConstituentCodeID = ID from dbo.CONSTITUENCYCODE where DESCRIPTION = lower ('Partner - Group') if @partnerGroupConstituentCodeID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Could not find "Partner - Group" constituency code' end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
select distinct top(@MAXROWS) org.ID, org.LOOKUPID, org.NAME, addr.CITY, st.DESCRIPTION as STATENAME
from dbo.CONSTITUENT org left join dbo.ADDRESS addr on org.ID = addr.CONSTITUENTID left join dbo.STATE st on st.ID = addr.STATEID
where org.ISORGANIZATION = 1 and exists (select CONSTITUENTID from dbo.CONSTITUENCY where CONSTITUENCYCODEID in (@partnerConstituentCodeID, @partnerChurchConstituentCodeID, @partnerGroupConstituentCodeID) and CONSTITUENTID = org.ID)
and addr.ISPRIMARY = 1 and (@STATEID is null or @STATEID = addr.STATEID) and (org.NAME LIKE coalesce('%'+@NAME+'%','%')) and IsNull(org.LOOKUPID, IsNull(@LOOKUPID,'')) LIKE IsNull(@LOOKUPID,'') + '%' and isNull(addr.CITY, IsNull(@CITY,'')) LIKE '%'+IsNull(@CITY,'') + '%'
/*and (org.NAME LIKE @NAME) and (org.LOOKUPID LIKE @LOOKUPID) and (addr.CITY like @CITY) */ order by NAME asc
return 0
